ARABIC: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ ءَالِهَتِهِمْ فَقَالَ أَلَا تَأْكُلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He turned surreptitiously to their gods and said, 'Do you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Then he turned towards their gods and said: "Why do you not eat (of these offerings)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then he went quietly to the (temple of the deities) and said: “What is the matter with you, why do you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and he turned to their idols and asked them, "Do you eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He then sneaked upon their deities and said, “Do you not eat?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he turned to their gods and said: "Will you not eat"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then he turned aside to their gods secretly and said: What! do you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then he turned to their gods, and said, 'What do you eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then turned he to their gods and said: Will ye not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then he slipped Unto their gods and said: eat ye not
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then he stole away to their gods and said, ‘Will you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then did he turn to their gods and said, "will ye not eat (of the offerings before you)?...
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he turned to their aliha (gods) and said: "Will you not eat (of the offering before you)?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Then he turned to their gods, and said: 'What do you eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he turned to their gods, and said, “will you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then he turned to their gods and said, "Do you not eat?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:91] Then he turned, he stole away, to their gods, the idols, in front of which the food had been placed, and said, mockingly: ‘Will you not eat? — but they failed to utter [a word].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then turned he) i.e. Abraham (to their gods and said) to them: (Will ye not eat) the honey you have on you?
